name: EIA Dev Environment
postCreateCommand: bash -lc 'set -euo pipefail; python3 -m venv /workspaces/eia_dev/.venv; source /workspaces/eia_dev/.venv/bin/activate; python -m pip install --upgrade pip; python -m pip install -r /workspaces/eia_dev/my-eia-api-tool/requirements.txt; echo "source /workspaces/eia_dev/.venv/bin/activate" >> ~/.bashrc'
